title: Sales Force Account

sfdc:legalName.title: Account Name
sfdc:legalName.description: name of company. Up to 255 characters are allowed in this field.

sfdc:accountRecordType.title: Account Record Type
sfdc:accountRecordType.description: Name of the field that determines what picklist values are available for the record. Available in professional, enterprise, unlimited, performance, and developer editions.

sfdc:accountSource.title: Account Source
sfdc:accountSource.description: The source of the account record. For example, advertisement, data.com, or trade show. The source is selected from a picklist of available values, which a salesforce admin sets. Each picklist value can have up to 40 characters.

sfdc:cleanStatus.title: Clean Status
sfdc:cleanStatus.description: The record’s clean status, as compared with data.com. Values are not compared, in sync, reviewed, different, not found, and inactive. This field is available if you use data.com prospector or data.com clean.

sfdc:customLinks.title: Custom Links
sfdc:customLinks.description: listing of custom links for accounts as set up by your salesforce admin.

sfdc:masterRecordId.title: Account
sfdc:masterRecordId.description: master record id of the account

sfdc:partnerAccountId.title: Partner Account
sfdc:partnerAccountId.description: Read-only field that indicates whether an account is a partner account.

sfdc:site.title: Account Site
sfdc:site.description: information about the account’s location, such as single location, headquarters, or branch. Up to 80 characters are allowed in this field.

sfdc:territory.title: Tradestyle
sfdc:territory.description: a name, different from its legal name, that a company can use for conducting business. Similar to “doing business as” or “dba”. This field is available if you use data.com prospector or data.com clean.

sfdc:territoryId.title: Territories
sfdc:territoryId.description: The territories to which the account has been assigned.

sfdc:tickerSymbol.title: Ticker Symbol
sfdc:tickerSymbol.description: The abbreviation used to identify publicly traded shares of a particular stock. Also known as the stock symbol. Up to 20 characters are allowed in this field.

sfdc:yearStarted.title: Year Started
sfdc:yearStarted.description: The year the company was established or the year when current ownership or management assumed control of the company. If the company establishment or ownership year is unavailable, then the year the dun & bradstreet record was created will be used. Dun & bradstreet does not supply this data for branch locations.this field is available if you use data.com prospector or data.com clean.

sfdc:jigsaw.title: Data.com Key
sfdc:jigsaw.description: The company’s id in data.com. When salesforce records are compared with data.com records (via manual cleaning or automated clean jobs), if data.com finds a match, the two records are linked by this field’s numeric value.

sfdc:legalNameLocal.title: Account Name (Local)
sfdc:legalNameLocal.description: The name of the account translated into the local language.

sfdc:NAICSDescription.title: NAICS Description
sfdc:NAICSDescription.description: A brief description of an organization’s line of business, based on its naics code. This field is available if you use data.com prospector or data.com clean.

sfdc:sicDesc.title: SIC Description
sfdc:sicDesc.description: A brief description of an organization’s line of business, based on its sic code.

sfdc:type.title: Account Type
sfdc:type.description: Type of account, for example, customer, competitor, or partner. Entry is selected from a picklist of available values, which a salesforce admin sets. Each picklist value can have up to 40 characters.
